text: The Nerussa () is a river in Oryol and Bryansk Oblasts in Russia. It is a left tributary of the Desna. It is long, and has a drainage basin of .Нерусса, Great Soviet Encyclopedia The river flows through the town of Dmitrovsk. == References == Category:Rivers of Bryansk Oblast Category:Rivers of Oryol Oblast
title: Nerussa (river)
